text: Kimmi Clark Lewis (March 19, 1957 â€“ December 6, 2019) was an American politician. He was a state representative from Kim, Colorado. She was a member of the Republican Party. Lewis represented Colorado House of Representatives District 64 from 2017 until her death. Lewis died of breast cancer in Kim, Colorado on December 6, 2019 at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Colorado Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Kimmi Lewis
